verb.description: Poke (someone) with a finger, foot, or pointed object.
examples: he prodded her in the ribs to stop her snoring
a woman prods at a tiger with a stick

noun.description: A poke with a finger, foot, or pointed object.
examples: he gave the wire netting an experimental prod

noun.description: A pointed implement, typically one discharging an electric current and used as a goad.

origin: Mid 16th century (as a verb): perhaps symbolic of a short poking movement, or a blend of poke and dialect brod to goad, prod. The noun dates from the mid 18th century.
